title: Healthy lunch options(RR)
content: Can you drop a list of healthy food options available in PES canteens or Sutta Gully? GJB canteen only ever has idli, pulao, or rice bath and Iâ€™m so done eating the same stuff every day.

comments.body: Skm,foodcourt the hostel messes , they give u lunch for 100rs
yes they can , although u wont see that many girls (or any at all) , it is completely allowed for all
Yup u can , but let me tell its not any fancy food , just plain lunch lol dont have any expectations
Many girls do go to skm for lunch now
